statements: SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE access_level > 5;
SELECT role_name, access_level FROM permissions WHERE sensitive_info_restrict = true;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT permission_id, role_name FROM permissions ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name, access_level FROM permissions WHERE access_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE access_level > 2 ORDER BY role_name DESC, permission_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM permissions WHERE sensitive_info_restrict = true;
SELECT permission_id, role_name FROM permissions WHERE role_name LIKE 'admin%' AND access_level >= 5;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE user_id = 'c00351a3-9796-4c72-87d0-062eb7d1dabc' AND access_level = 3;
SELECT COUNT(permission_id) AS permission_count, role_name FROM permissions GROUP BY role_name HAVING COUNT(permission_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM permissions;
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id DESC;
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_roles;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 1;
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE '%read%';
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM permissions p JOIN user_roles r ON p.permission_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM permissions;
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_info;
SELECT info_id, UPPER(info_content) AS uppercase_content FROM sensitive_info ORDER BY info_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 1;
SELECT info_content FROM sensitive_info WHERE info_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE '%read%' ORDER BY permission_id DESC;
SELECT info_content FROM sensitive_info WHERE info_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM permissions;
SELECT role_name, access_level FROM permissions ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT data_content FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, data_id FROM user_access WHERE user_id = 100 AND data_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM permissions ORDER BY access_level DESC, role_name ASC
SELECT role_name, access_level FROM permissions WHERE access_level > 2
SELECT user_id, role_id, role_name FROM user_roles INNER JOIN permissions ON user_roles.role_id = permissions.id
SELECT data_id, LEFT(data_content, 50) AS short_content FROM sensitive_data WHERE LENGTH(data_content) > 50
SELECT user_id, data_id FROM user_access JOIN user_roles ON user_access.user_id = user_roles.user_id ORDER BY data_id ASC
SELECT * FROM permissions;
SELECT permission_name, permission_id FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, role_name FROM users INNER JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT info_id, info_content FROM sensitive_information WHERE info_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, role_id FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;

SELECT u.user_name, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role_id = r.role_id JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT u.user_name, COUNT(up.permission_id) AS num_permissions FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id GROUP BY u.user_name HAVING num_permissions > 2;
SELECT info_id, info_content FROM sensitive_information WHERE info_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY info_id ASC;
